and religious liberty have forgotten the lessons of history," said Rep. Mike Pence , R-Ind., at the Family Research Council's 2010 Values Voter Summit. Former Arkansas Mike Huckabee , at the same summit, said: We need to understand there is a direct correlation between the stability of families and the stability of our economy.... The real reason we have poverty is we have a breakdown of the basic family structure. And Sen. Visitors will be directed to a replica of the painted burial chamber, which will be installed close to Carter's former home in Luxor. Replicas of two other closed tombs will be opened nearby. There's no alternative. Closing the tombs is the only way to preserve them, said Zahi Hawass , Egypt's antiquities chief. "If I don't build this "Valley of the Replicas", the originals will be destroyed in less than 100 years. That would be a disaster for history

for president or governor, gave few clues Monday as he addressed the Indiana General Assembly. Those who expect Mike Pence , R-Columbus, to run for governor may have been heartened by his statement to lawmakers that the states hold the promise of the future. Those who are pushing him instead to run for the White House in 2012 may focus in on his call for a "new federalism"-- which sounded like a budding presidential slogan.

This move is a big one for ol' Google, as Eric Schmidt , Page and Sergey Brin have long run the company as a trio, an approach Page articulated quite clearly in the company's 2004 IPO filing: We run Google as a triumvirate. The three of us run the company collaboratively with Sergey Brin and me as presidents. The structure is unconventional, but we have worked successfully in this way. Though it goes against Google's well-worn techniques, Shmidt claims the reorganization won't hurt the company's mojo. In fact, he believes the new management structure will speed up the decision making process.

the world's most- used search engine, generating$ 29 billion in sales last year. "Larry is ready," Eric Schmidt , who will become executive chairman, said today on a conference call. It's time for him to have a shot at running this. Eric Schmidt , 55, who joined the company in 2001, will focus on deals, partnerships and customers, he wrote in a blog post. Page will take over day-to-day operations as CEO on April 4

standing by Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital bed when her left eye fluttered open. Her right eye was damaged and is still bandaged. "PROUD OF HER" Kirsten Gillibrand told reporters the congresswomen were telling Gabrielle Giffords how proud we were of her and how she was inspiring the whole nation with her courage and with her strength. And then Debbie Wasserman Schultz and I started joking about all the things we were going to do after she got better.
